You can save up to

with American Express GBT

Complete the form to reveal your savings

1. Average savings from American Express Global Business Travel US Middle Market clients on transactions made using the GBT Preferred Extras Hotel Program. All discounts depend on route and class and are not combinable with corporate agreements. Air savings reflect the average gross fare difference expressed as a percentage from booking a Preferred Extras fare rather than the equivalent published fare for the selected flight for January – June 2018. Equivalent refers to the same or better for fare terms and conditions. Individual results may vary. Additional terms may apply.

2. Average savings from American Express Global Business Travel US Middle Market clients on transactions made using the GBT Preferred Extras Hotel Program. Based on hotel transaction invoice data from January through November 2018 for clients who have had more than one booking per month.

3. Estimated discount for car rental agencies is based on an internal audit of American Express Global Business Travel Preferred Extras program data in June 2018. The audit was made up of select US Middle Market clients without corporate negotiated rates. Program content is based on contractual agreements and availability and is subject to change without notice. Individual results may vary. Additional terms may apply.

This calculation is based on GBT historical data. Your actual savings may vary.
